If_Bit_is_Set(Variable=0x2100000E)

CAM_OFFSET(unknown=0x41000000, unknown=0xC0400000)
Set_Camera_Boundaries(Front=7, Back=-7, Top=5, Bottom=-5)
}
FALSE(Unknown=0x7){
Set_Camera_Boundaries(Front=0, Back=0, Top=5, Bottom=-5)
}

Screen_Tint(TransitionTime=0x1, Red=0x64, Green=0x0, Blue=0x0, Alpha=0x0, unknown=0xFF, unknown=0x6, unknown=0xFF)
Script_End()

Set_Camera_Boundaries(Front=7, Back=-7, Top=5, Bottom=-5)
}
FALSE(Unknown=0x7){
Set_Camera_Boundaries(Front=0, Back=0, Top=5, Bottom=-5)
}
CAM_ZOOM_IN(unknown=0x64)
Screen_Tint(TransitionTime=0x1, Red=0x64, Green=0x0, Blue=0x0, Alpha=0x0, unknown=0xFF, unknown=0x6, unknown=0xFF)
Script_End()
